member.name: DFileSystemImageEvents.Update
member.summary: Implement this method to receive progress notification of the current write operation. The notifications are sent when copying the content of a file or while adding directories or files to the file system image.

param.name: object
param.para: An interface of the file system image that is being written.
This parameter is a CFileSystemImage object in a script.

member.param: String that contains the full path of the file being written.
Total number of sectors in the file.

member.name: DFileSystemImageEvents
member.summary: Implement this interface to receive notifications of the current write operation.
